パッケージ ow.messaging

インタフェースの概要
ExtendedMessageHandler  
MessageHandler An interface which a callback for a received message implements.
MessageReceiver  
MessageSender  
MessagingAddress Address of a communication endpoint in this messaging framework.
MessagingProvider The interface which a messaging provider for various transport protocols (TCP, UDP, Emulator, ...) implements.
 

クラスの概要
AbstractMessagingProvider  
InetMessagingAddress A MessagingAddress for UDP and TCP Messaging services.
Message  
MessagingConfiguration  
MessagingFactory The factory which provides a messaging provider.
Signature A class to calculate a signature of messages.
Tag
